thread.title: BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals announces Hanwa Co. Ltd. to join Waterberg Joint Venture

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals announces Hanwa Co. Ltd. to join Waterberg Joint Venture
text: March 9, 2018 / 7:08 AM / in 39 minutes BRIEF-Platinum Group Metals announces Hanwa Co. Ltd. to join Waterberg Joint Venture Reuters Staff March 9 (Reuters) - Platinum Group Metals Ltd: * ANNOUNCES DIVERSIFIED JAPANESE TRADING COMPANY HANWA CO. LTD. TO JOIN WATERBERG JOINT VENTURE * PLATINUM GROUP METALS -‍IMPALA PLATINUM PAID $30 MILLION FOR A 15% INTEREST IN WATERBERG PROJECT INCLUDING A RIGHT OF FIRST REFUSAL FOR CONCENTRATE OFFTAKE​ * PLATINUM GROUP METALS - ‍JAPAN OIL, GAS AND METALS NATIONAL CORP AND HANWA SIGNED MOU TO TRANSFER PART OF JOGMEC’S INTEREST IN WATERBERG JV * ‍WINNER OF BIDDING WAS HANWA, AND JOGMEC WILL NOW START NEGOTIATION ON TERMS OF TRANSFER WITH HANWA​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
